Explainable AI: The utterances were generated to cover a variety of ways users might ask about DMV-related information. They include questions about hours of operation, online services, appointment scheduling, nearest office locations, car registration, address changes, driving test requirements, fees, holiday hours, lost documents, forms, vehicle registration updates, out-of-state license transfers, practice test materials, and record checks. Different phrasing styles (e.g., formal/informal, direct/indirect questions) were used to reflect the diversity of how people express these inquiries.
